name: ian_olympic-medals-host-cities
title: Olympic medals & host cities
description:
Summer Olympics: Cumulative medal count by country and record of host cities by year.

Analysis
========

Correlation between `total_summer` and `no_games`: `r = 0.42`

Correlation between `total_summer` and `no_hosted`: `r = 0.81`

![Participation vs. Medals](http://i.imgur.com/egbQMDJ.png "Title")

Explanation of chart below, from [@msantolini](https://data.world/msantolini "Title")

>...countries that participate more have more medal per participation. They don't just cumulate more (which could just be due to the fact that there is a constant rate of medals per participation that you sum over), but the more they participate, the more they invest in structures and diverse sports to get more medals.


![Medals per particiption](http://i.imgur.com/kSSyQqi.png "Title")

Definitions and notes
========

`total_summer` = Cumulative number of medals won in Summer Olympics

`no_games` = Cumulative number of times participated in Summer Olympics

`no_hosted` = Cumulative number of times hosted Summer Olympics

`Russia` = combined counts for `Soviet Union`, `Russian Empire`, `Russia`. 

`Germany` = combined counts for `West Germany`, `East Germany`, `United Team of Germany`, `Germany`. 

Sources
========


Source for host city / nation data: [cpudney](https://gist.github.com/cpudney/3279878#file-hosts-csv "Title")

Source for medal count: [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Olympic_Games_host_cities "Title")
